name: wood preservative production, inorganic salt, containing Cr, outdoor use, ground contact | wood preservative, inorganic salt, containing Cr | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11067/documentation

According to EN 335-1:2005, five use classes are distinguished for chemical wood protection based on the general exposure of wood in its application, wetting regime in service and the biological agents to be expected. This exposure scenario determines the potentially vulnerable zone of wood and the required treatment for the application of the wood preservative (see table)

From reception of chemicals at the factory gate

The datasets covers the components and preparation of a typical water-based/organic solvent based [as applicable] wood preservative for the use class according to EN 335-1:2006 as indicated in the name of the dataset, ready to be packed. In addition in contains an estimate for electricity consumption and for infrastructure. Packaging is not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/202:Manufacture of other chemical products/2021:Manufacture of pesticides and other agrochemical products

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Ideal-type formulation of wood preservative for a water-/solvent-based [as applicable] wood preservative for the respective use class
